name: sailfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fish with a long, narrow, pointed mouth and a very high fin on its back that looks like a sail (= a sheet attached to a pole on a boat that makes the boat move): The sailfish is found worldwide, at the edge of coastal waters and in the open sea.
Alastair Pollock Photography/Moment/GettyImages
